items.title: Promotional Video Spots
items.summary: Design Concept To create short sharp and bodacious lo-fi advertisements for upcoming events for various event promoters and venues. The…
items.content_html:
Design Concept To create short sharp and bodacious lo-fi advertisements for upcoming events for various event promoters and venues. The commercials must adhere to the branding of all posters and marketing material to tie into the advertising of said events.  

Videos Matthew Haynes

Creative Director Matthew Haynes

Client  BTHC / A Love Supreme / Bizarro Life / Shade / Location Transmission

items.title: DJ Sports - Temptation - ESO-003
items.summary: Design Concept - A simple throw back to 90s house records with a large sticker to match the centre label…
items.content_html:
Design Concept - A simple throw back to 90s house records with a large sticker to match the centre label for the DJ Sport's Temptation vinyl release. 

Graphics Natal Zaks

Producer Milan Zaks

Creative Director Matthew Haynes

Client  Esoteric Exports

Mastering Simon Davey

Pressing Curved

Press Release 

Hej! For ESO-003 we've tapped into that Århus connection again. DJ Sports coming in

bass heavy with three tracks made for the club. A little dubsteppy, a little garagey, a lotta good. Produced with love and cut nice n loud to be played at 45.
